prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Leveraging the full potential of AI in business is becoming increasingly important, as this technological revolution will likely create both winners and losers across various industries.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: AI, business, technological revolution, industries, winners, losers, potential, leveraging
